column4: Anyone know what a great music program is for a huge library of music and that has the feature to be able to edit the metadata of the music file...And also that the program has last.fm support?
XMMS can also do all the staff you mentioned before
does it also look nice? I am a very picky person, sorry. lol
hahaah, XMMS looks just like Winamp of Window$
ah, i see. i will check it out.
Do you know what might be the problem when I try to tag a song's metadata in Rhythmbox and it gives me a GStream error?
XMMs is quite good, but make sure you install the extension to play last.fm
Do you know what the command is to get the last.fm plugin for XMMS?
I'm not sure about it, because i found the extension surfing in Synaptic
Oh, ok. I'll just get it there. What is the exact file name of the synaptic file for the plugin?
I suggest you to try Synaptic and do a Search (Name only) with the keyword: xmms
hmm...can't find a last.fm plugin in synaptic...=\
lol =\ I opened up XMMS and it doesn't appeal to me. :(
I think I will try amarok
